sentences.sContent: We have full stereo sound, video, 35 mm slides.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have full stereo sound, video, 35 mm slides.
sentences.sCn: 我们有立体声、视频及35 毫米幻灯片。

sentences.sContent: The screen is now flush with the case and we’ve decreased the overall thickness to about 18 mm.
sentences.sContent_eng: The screen is now flush with the case and we’ve decreased the overall thickness to about 18 mm.
sentences.sCn: 现在的屏幕已经和外壳在同一平面上，而且我们已经将总厚度压缩到18毫米。
